item.title: About
item.author: lamy9813@gmail.com (Lamy)
item.description:
Hugo is a static site engine written in Go.

It makes use of a variety of open source projects including:

  • Cobra
  • Viper
  • J Walter Weatherman
  • Cast

Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"io/ioutil"
	"log"
	"net/http"
	"os"
	"os/exec"
	"regexp"
	"strings"
	"time"

	colorable "github.com/mattn/go-colorable"
	"github.com/sirupsen/logrus"
)

var (
	ch          = make(chan int)
	IDocViewUrl = "https://view.xbongbong.com/"
	// æ¢æ´»æ—¶é—´é—´éš”
	interval = time.Second * 30
	Sum      int
	pidSlice = []int{}
	ticker   = time.NewTicker(interval)
)

func init() {
	logrus.SetFormatter(&logrus.TextFormatter{ForceColors: true})
	logrus.SetOutput(colorable.NewColorableStdout())
}

func main() {
	// å¯åŠ¨å»¶æ—¶ã€‚ã€‚Ã—
	/* tick := time.Tick(1 * time.Second)
	for countdown := 10; countdown > 0; countdown-- {
		fmt.Printf("\r%2d", countdown)
		<-tick
	} */

	fileWriter, err := os.OpenFile("log.txt", os.O_WRONLY|os.O_CREATE|os.O_APPEND, 0755)
	defer fileWriter.Close()
	if err != nil {
		log.Fatalln("Can't open log.txt...", err)
	}
	logger := log.New(io.Writer(fileWriter), "", log.Lshortfile|log.Ldate|log.LstdFlags)

	// æ¯60sæ¢æµ‹ä¸€æ¬¡
	go func() {
		for t := range ticker.C {
			fmt.Println("Tick at", t)
			// resp, err := http.Get(IDocViewUrl)
			resp, err := http.Get(IDocViewUrl)
			if err != nil {
				log.Println(err)
				log.Println(pidSlice)
				log.Printf("æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œç¬¬ã€%v/3ã€‘æ¬¡æ¢æµ‹ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚\n", len(pidSlice))
				HandleReturnResp(strings.NewReader(""), 0, logger)
				continue
			}
			HandleReturnResp(resp.Body, resp.StatusCode, logger)
		}
		ch <- 1
	}()
	<-ch
}

// HandleReturnResp: å¤„ç†bodyè¿”å›å†…å®¹ä»¥åŠè¿”å›å“åº”ç 
func HandleReturnResp(r io.Reader, respCode int, logger *log.Logger) {

	if len(pidSlice) >= 3 {
		pidSlice = nil
	}
	body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(r)
	if err != nil {
		logger.Println(err)
	}

	respStr := string(body)
	matchStr, _ := regexp.MatchString(".*10.6.1_20200807.*", respStr)
	// æ»¡è¶³æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾è¦æ±‚ï¼Œä¸”è¿”å›å€¼ä¸º200
	if respCode == 0 {

		// *** å­˜æ´»æ€§æ¢æµ‹å¤±è´¥ï¼š0
		pidSlice = append(pidSlice, 0)
		GetPorcessPid(logger)

	} else if matchStr && respCode == 200 {

		// *** é€šè¿‡å­˜æ´»æ€§æ¢æµ‹ï¼Œä¸”é€šè¿‡å°±ç»ªæ€§æ¢æµ‹: 1
		pidSlice = append(pidSlice, 1)

		logger.SetPrefix("ã€SUCCESSã€‘")
		logger.Println("æœåŠ¡æ­£å¸¸ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€ç ", respCode, "\r\n")
		logrus.Info("æœåŠ¡æ­£å¸¸!")
	} else {

		// *** é€šè¿‡å­˜æ´»æ€§æ¢æµ‹ï¼Œä½†å°±ç»ªæ€§æ¢æµ‹å¤±è´¥ï¼š0
		pidSlice = append(pidSlice, 0)

		GetPorcessPid(logger)
	}
}

// GetPorcessPid: é‡å¯iDocViewæœåŠ¡
func GetPorcessPid(logger *log.Logger) {

	cmd := exec.Command("tasklist.exe", "/fo", "csv", "/nh")
	out, err := cmd.Output()
	if err != nil {
		log.Println(err)
	}

	// ä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™åŒ¹é…iiDocViewè¿è¡Œä¹‹åçš„Javaè¿›ç¨‹
	re := regexp.MustCompile(".*java.*")
	text := strings.Join(re.FindAllString(string(out), -1), ",")
	pid := strings.Split(text, ",")
	// if len(pidSlice) >= 3 {
	// 	pidSlice = nil
	// }
	logger.SetPrefix("ã€FAILEDã€‘ ")
	logger.Printf("æ¢æ´»å¤±è´¥--%v--\r\n", len(pidSlice))

	// å½“è¿›ç¨‹ä¸å­˜åœ¨æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šæŠ›å‡ºè¶…ç´¢å¼•panicï¼Œåœ¨æ­¤ä½¿ç”¨recoverè¿›è¡Œæ•è·
	// æ ‡å¿—0ä¸ºè¿›ç¨‹ä¸å­˜åœ¨
	defer func() {
		if err := recover(); err != nil {
			// pidSlice = append(pidSlice, 0)
			HandleProcessCondition(pidSlice, "")
		}
	}()
	fmt.Println("the Java process pid is: ", pid[1])
	// æ ‡å¿—1ä¸ºè¿›ç¨‹å­˜åœ¨
	// pidSlice = append(pidSlice, 1)
	HandleProcessCondition(pidSlice, pid[1])
}

// å½“æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶æ—¶æ€æ­»è¯¥è¿›ç¨‹ï¼Œä¸€åˆ†é’Ÿå†…æ¢æ´»ä¸‰æ¬¡ï¼Œ
// ä¸‰æ¬¡æœ‰ä¸¤æ¬¡å¤±è´¥åˆ™æ€æ­»è¿›ç¨‹ï¼Œç„¶åå°è¯•é‡å¯è¿›ç¨‹.
func HandleProcessCondition(signal []int, pid string) {
	logrus.Warn(signal)
	if len(signal) == 3 {
		log.Printf("æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œç¬¬ã€%v/3ã€‘æ¬¡æ¢æµ‹ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚\r\n", len(signal))
		Sum = signal[0] + signal[1] + signal[2]
		if Sum >= 2 {
			logrus.Info("iDocViewå­˜æ´»")
		} else {
			ticker.Stop()
			// signal = nil
			log.Printf("iDocViewæŒ‚äº†ï¼Œå³å°†è¿›è¡Œé‡å¯...ã€%vã€‘\r\n", pid)
			HandleProcess(pid)
			ticker.Reset(interval)
		}
	} else {
		log.Printf("æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œç¬¬ã€%v/3ã€‘æ¬¡æ¢æµ‹ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚\r\n", len(signal))
	}

}

// æ²¡æœ‰é€šè¿‡å­˜æ´»æ£€éªŒçš„pidå°†ä¼šä¼ åˆ°è¿™é‡Œ
// æ ¹æ®pidï¼Œæ€æ­»è¿›ç¨‹ï¼Œç„¶åé‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨è¯¥è¿›ç¨‹
func HandleProcess(pid string) {
	if pid != "" {
		killCMD := exec.Command("taskkill.exe", "/F", "/im", "java.exe", "/T")
		output, err := killCMD.Output()
		if err != nil {
			log.Println(err)
		}
		logrus.Error("Killing iDocView Process: ", output)
	}
	time.Sleep(time.Second * 1)
	// é‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨ç¨‹åºï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œå¯åŠ¨å‘½ä»¤
	log.Println("æ­£åœ¨å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ã€‚ã€‚")
	startCMD := exec.Command("cmd.exe", "/C", "start", "D:\\idocv\\start.bat")
	startCMD.Start()

	time.Sleep(time.Second * 2)
	log.Println("å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ•°ç§’åå°†æ‰“å¼€æµ‹è¯•é¡µé¢ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚")
	time.Sleep(time.Second * 12)

	openURLCMD := exec.Command("rundll32", "url.dll,FileProtocolHandler", IDocViewUrl)
	openURLCMD.Start()
}

// Log2fileAndStdout: åŒæ—¶å°†æ ‡å‡†è¾“å‡ºåˆ°ç»ˆç«¯å’Œæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­.
// ä¿ç•™ï¼Œæš‚ä¸å¯ç”¨
func Log2fileAndS1tdout(f *os.File, logText string) {
	// è®¾ç½®æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ–‡ä»¶
	// å®šä¹‰å¤šä¸ªå†™å…¥å™¨
	writers := []io.Writer{
		f,
		os.Stdout}
	fileAndStdoutWriter := io.MultiWriter(writers...)
	// åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„logå¯¹è±¡
	logger := log.New(fileAndStdoutWriter, "", log.Ldate|log.Ltime|log.Lshortfile)
	// ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„logå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå†™å…¥æ—¥å¿—å†…å®¹
	logger.Println(logText)
}

MacOSç³»ç»Ÿäº¤å‰ç¼–è¯‘æˆWindowsç¨‹åºï¼š

1

$ CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -v -o iDoc_prd_v1.1.exe main.go

Windows æœåŠ¡

ä½¿ç”¨nssmå°†ç¨‹åºæ³¨å†ŒæˆæœåŠ¡ï¼Œå¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œåœ¨æ­¤ä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ä»…åˆ—å‡ºç›¸å…³å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

  • æ–°å»ºæœåŠ¡ï¼šnssm install

  • å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼šnssm start

  • åœæ­¢æœåŠ¡ï¼šnssm stop

  • é‡å¯æœåŠ¡ï¼šnssm restart

  • ä¿®æ”¹æœåŠ¡ï¼šnssm edit

â€œé«˜å¯ç”¨â€æœåŠ¡ï¼Œå½“æœåŠ¡æŒ‚æ‰çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨è¿›è¡Œé‡å¯æ“ä½œï¼š
